BackwardDescription.Details: Reverse-move at a slower speed to a nearby location, and set a new facing for this 'Mech.
BackwardDescription.Name: REVERSE

BadFaithRetreatDesc.Details: You are withdrawing in bad faith. Think of your reputation. Are you sure?
BadFaithRetreatDesc.Name: WITHDRAW (BAD FAITH)

CameraStageOneTutorialDesc.Details: Move the mouse to the edge of the screen (or use W, A, S, and D) to move the camera.
CameraStageOneTutorialDesc.Name: Camera Movement

CameraStageTwoTutorialDesc.Details: Use the right mouse button (or Q and E) to rotate the camera.
CameraStageTwoTutorialDesc.Name: Camera Rotation

DangerousLocationDesc.Details: Units in this location are at risk of destruction.
DangerousLocationDesc.Name: DANGEROUS

DoneDescription.Details: Remove UNSTEADY and end this 'Mech's turn. Gain GUARDED (20% damage reduction against ranged attacks to the front and side) and ENTRENCHED (50% stability damage reduction).
DoneDescription.Name: BRACE (END TURN)

DoneDescriptionBulwark.Details: Remove UNSTEADY and end this 'Mech's turn. Gain BULWARK (40% damage reduction against ranged attacks to the front and side) and ENTRENCHED (50% stability damage reduction).
DoneDescriptionBulwark.Name: BRACE (END TURN)

DropPodLocationDesc.Details: A DropPod is inbound to this location. Units here are at risk of destruction.
DropPodLocationDesc.Name: DANGEROUS

DrophipLocationDesc.Details: A DropShip is inbound to this location. Units here are at risk of destruction.
DrophipLocationDesc.Name: DANGEROUS

EjectDescription.Details: Eject your pilot. They will be saved from further injuries, but their 'Mech will be unusable for the rest of this mission, and its Head location will be destroyed.
EjectDescription.Name: EJECT

EvasiveTutorialDesc.Details: The farther you move, the more EVASIVE charges you will gain. Each EVASIVE charge makes you harder to hit.
EvasiveTutorialDesc.Name: Evasion

FireDescription.Details: Fire selected weapons at any target within this 'Mech's current firing arc.
FireDescription.Name: FIRE

FireMultiDescription.Details: Fire weapons at up to three separate targets within this 'Mech's current firing arc.
FireMultiDescription.Name: MULTI-TARGET

FiringTutorialDesc.Details: Select a target with your mouse, or press TAB to cycle between targets. Click FIRE when ready.
FiringTutorialDesc.Name: Firing

FuryBarDescription.Details:
Your lance gains Fury as bad things happen to it.
When the bar fills, you can use it to perform a Precision Strike with one MechWarrior.
FuryBarDescription.Name: Fury

GoodFaithRetreatDesc.Details: You gave it your best. Are you sure you want to withdraw?
GoodFaithRetreatDesc.Name: WITHDRAW (GOOD FAITH)

CombatUIConstants.InjuryStringDFASelf: killed while trying to jump on an enemy {KILLEDBY_UNIT.Description.Name}
CombatUIConstants.InjuryStringDFASelfGeneric: killed while trying to jump on an enemy
CombatUIConstants.InjuryStringHeadHit: hit in the head by an enemy {KILLEDBY_UNIT.Description.Name}
CombatUIConstants.InjuryStringHeadHitMelee: struck in the head by an enemy {KILLEDBY_UNIT.Description.Name}

InterleaveIntroTutorialDesc.Details:
Once combat has begun, different 'Mechs move in different Phases. Lighter units generally move earlier than heavier ones.
To Reserve all units' actions to a later Phase, use the Reserve button, or press the End key.
InterleaveIntroTutorialDesc.Name: Combat Phases

JumpDescription.Details: Execute a jump move, gaining EVASIVE charges based on distance. -3 Accuracy .You may also use Jump to initiate a 'Death from Above' attack on nearby enemies.
JumpDescription.Name: JUMP

MeleeTutorialDesc.Details: Click the Melee targeting reticle on the enemy, or press V to cycle through Melee targets. Then, click the Attack button.
MeleeTutorialDesc.Name: Melee Attack

MoraleAttackDescription.Details:
Take a Called Shot against a single target with an Accuracy Penalty. Tactics and Piloting improve this.
 The target's next Initiative is reduced by your Gunnery and Tactics skills / 2.
MoraleAttackDescription.Name: Offensive Push

MoraleAttackTutorialDesc.Details: Select the {0} skill and fire at the enemy target. You may call a shot at any location on the target.
MoraleAttackTutorialDesc.Name: unused-filled in by morale constants

MoraleBarDescription.Details:
Your lance gains <color=#F79B26>{0}</color> Resolve each round of combat.
 When your MechWarriors become Inspired, gain a +1 to ECM Status and Probe Rolls
MoraleBarDescription.Name: Resolve

MoraleCostAttackDescriptionHigh.Details: Cost: <color=#85DBF6FF>5 Resolve (this MechWarrior has High Spirits)</color>
MoraleCostAttackDescriptionHigh.Name: PRECISION STRIKE COST HIGH

MoraleCostAttackDescriptionLow.Details: Cost: <color=#F04228FF>20 Resolve (this MechWarrior has Low Spirits)</color>
MoraleCostAttackDescriptionLow.Name: PRECISION STRIKE COST LOW

MoraleCostDefendDescriptionHigh.Details: Cost: <color=#85DBF6FF>25 Resolve (this MechWarrior has High Spirits)</color>
MoraleCostDefendDescriptionHigh.Name: VIGILANCE COST HIGH

MoraleCostDefendDescriptionLow.Details: Cost: <color=#F04228FF>50 Resolve (this MechWarrior has Low Spirits)</color>
MoraleCostDefendDescriptionLow.Name: VIGILANCE COST LOW

MoraleDefendDescription.Details:
Gain GUARDED and ENTRENCHED and remove all stability damage.
 Your next Initiative is increased by Guts and Tactics / 2.
MoraleDefendDescription.Name: VIGILANCE

MoraleDefendTutorialDesc.Details: Select the {0} skill and move to the target location.
MoraleDefendTutorialDesc.Name: unused-filled in by morale constants

MoraleGeneralStageTwoTutorialDesc.Details: You can spend Resolve to use either of the Resolve abilities, {0} and {1}, located with the rest of the action buttons.
MoraleGeneralStageTwoTutorialDesc.Name: Resolve

MoraleGeneralTutorialDesc.Details: Your lance's Resolve (the blue bar next to your pilots) increases in each round of combat. When it is half full, your pilots will be Inspired (+2 Accuracy to all attacks).
MoraleGeneralTutorialDesc.Name: Resolve

MoveDescription.Details: Execute a normal move, gaining EVASIVE charges based on distance. -1 Accuracy. May also use to initiate a Melee attack on nearby enemies.
MoveDescription.Name: MOVE

MovementStageTwoTutorialDesc.Details: Move your mouse to the indicated point. Click once to select where you wish to move. Click again to choose which direction to face.
MovementStageTwoTutorialDesc.Name: Movement

MovementTutorialDesc.Details: Click on a MechWarrior's portrait, or press TAB to cycle between available units.
MovementTutorialDesc.Name: Unit Select

NonInterleaveIntroTutorialDesc.Details: Outside of combat, your entire lance moves in any order. You can even have multiple units moving at the same time.
NonInterleaveIntroTutorialDesc.Name: Team Movement

PoorlyMaintained25Desc.Details: This unit has been maintained in a substandard way and carries only 75% of its normal armor.
PoorlyMaintained25Desc.Name: MAKESHIFT

PoorlyMaintained50Desc.Details: This unit has received little upkeep and resupply and carries only 50% of its normal armor.
PoorlyMaintained50Desc.Name: SHODDY

PoorlyMaintained75Desc.Details: This unit has been kept in such poor condition that it barely holds together. It carries only 25% of its normal armor.
PoorlyMaintained75Desc.Name: RAMSHACKLE

SprintDescription.Details: Use this 'Mech's entire turn to move farther, gaining EVASIVE charges based on distance. -2 Accuracy. Cannot Sprint if UNSTEADY, or if a leg is destroyed.
SprintDescription.Name: SPRINT

Description.Details: Gain 4 extra heat for the next 3 rounds.
Description.Name: COOLANT VENT

ToHitMovingTargetStrings: 1 EVASIVE charge: +2 Difficulty to hit this unit.
2 EVASIVE charges: +4 Difficulty to hit this unit.
3 EVASIVE charges: +6 Difficulty to hit this unit.
4 EVASIVE charges: +8 Difficulty to hit this unit.
5 EVASIVE charges: +10 Difficulty to hit this unit.
6 EVASIVE charges: +12 Difficulty to hit this unit.
7 EVASIVE charges: +14 Difficulty to hit this unit.
8 EVASIVE charges: +16 Difficulty to hit this unit.
9 EVASIVE charges: +18 Difficulty to hit this unit.
10 EVASIVE charges: +20 Difficulty to hit this unit.
11 EVASIVE charges: +22 Difficulty to hit this unit.
12 EVASIVE charges: +24 Difficulty to hit this unit.
13 EVASIVE charges: +26 Difficulty to hit this unit.
14 EVASIVE charges: +28 Difficulty to hit this unit.
15 EVASIVE charges: +30 Difficulty to hit this unit.

Description.Details: Firing weapons suppresses Stealth on this unit for 1 Round.
Description.Name: FIRED WEAPONS: STEALTH SUPPRESSED

Description.Details: Sensor Lock suppresses Stealth on this unit for 1 Round.
Description.Name: SENSOR LOCK: STEALTH SUPPRESSED
